casebody.data:
ROBINSON
v.
HOOKS 200P07-8 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Kenneth Earl Robinson, for Robinson, Kenneth E. Tracy Nayer, Assistant Attorney General, Valerie Mitchell Asbell, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of January 2018 by Petitioner for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
